name: InstallPackage
title: Install FHIR Package
description: Installs a FHIR NPM package from the registry. The operation queues a background job to download and install the package along with its dependencies (if requested). Returns immediately with a job ID that can be used to track installation progress.

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: Package version (e.g. 4.0.1). If not specified, installs the latest version.

parameter.name: includeDependencies
parameter.documentation: When true (default), also installs package dependencies. When false, only installs the specified package.

parameter.name: includeExamples
parameter.documentation: When true, also installs example resources from the package. Default is false.

parameter.name: outcome
parameter.documentation: OperationOutcome indicating that the installation job was queued successfully.

parameter.name: jobId
parameter.documentation: The UUID of the background job processing the package installation.

parameter.name: name
parameter.documentation: Echo of the requested package name.

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: Echo of the requested package version.
